passive_1: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
passive_2: After taking damage from a champion or large monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 – 45 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness if owned by ranged champions or when triggered by area of effect, damage over time, or proc.

After taking damage from a champion, large monster or epic monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 – 45 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.

motd: Bugfix: Champions now properly benefit from the Endure passive.

motd: Bugfix: Fixed a bug where damage from spells weren't being reduced.
